To screen Children Oncology Group ( COG ) sample genetic aberration pediatric AMKL . OUTLINE : Cryopreserved specimen analyze NUP98 fusion NSD1 , JARID1A , TOP1 , myeloid/lymphoid mixed-lineage leukemia ( MLL ) -rearrangements , gene expression profile reverse transcriptase polymerase chain reaction ( RT-PCR ) karyotyping fluorescence situ hybridization ( FISH ) . Results compare patient 's outcome data .
